channel.title: Chase the Skunk Website Updates
channel.description: Up-to-date additions and changes to Chase the Skunk's website!

item.title: New Magic Class: Osteomancer
item.description: Added a new page for the osteomancer magic class.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Cu Sith
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Aspect species Cu Sith.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Ettette
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Ettette feral species.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Belaro
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Belaro species. I also cleaned up the bestiary section and added preview images for each species.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Drekaldr
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Drekaldr species.

item.title: Meet Vick the Vulture
item.description: Added a new character page for Vick Grasley the turkey vulture. http://chasetheskunk.com/characters/vick.html

item.title: Meet Preston the Wolf
item.description: Added a new character page for Preston D. G. Tatum the red wolf. http://chasetheskunk.com/characters/preston.html

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Taerundrin
item.description: Added a new bestiary entry for the monsters known as Taerundrin http://chasetheskunk.com/world/bestiary/taerundrin.html

item.title: Meet Snow the Polar Skunk!
item.description: Added a new character page for Snow Flocke the polar skunk. http://chasetheskunk.com/characters/snow.html
